participant_abstract.sent: Everyone gave a brief presentation on their current position with the remote after preliminary research.

Although our options for other non-telelvision based functions is out of the picture, my research showed a growing interest in voice technology and so we are pursing a touchscreen device with voice software capabilities.
Over all the meeting went well and everyone is on the same page as we pursue some specific design possibilities.

participant_actions.sent: We are pursuing the touch screen , sleek but simple voice activated remote path. each team member will come back to the table with more specific design options, specifically i will be looking into the current trends in the remote industry.

participant_decisions.sent: No recharging or docking options, therefore a cordless probably lithium battery option is our primary example.
Use compay colours, logo and slogan on boot up screen .
Paging function with or without voice recognition is going to need a paging base for the television.
Primary function screen will be very basic .

participant_problems.sent: Some of our primary interests in this design have been vetoed from above.
Some of our higher tech options are impossible because of cost and complexity being too much for the market.
